name: Wp-task-checklist-frontend
tagline: Wordpress plugin. Adds custom post type task. Displays tasks for visitors as checkboxes and checklists. Saves status of task in cookie.
body:
# WP-Task-Checklist-frontend
Wordpress plugin. Adds custom post type task. Displays tasks for visitors as checkboxes and checklists. Saves status of task in cookie.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
